title: How Many Teeth?
description: Some animals only have a couple teeth while others can have over twenty thousand teeth! How Many Teeth? is an informative and entertaining book about how different animals have different numbers of teeth. Detailed photographs of unusual animals will keep readers engaged. The book can also be used to teach students to ask and answer questions and to classify information.
reviewWords: different, fangs, numbers, opossum, teeth, vampire bat
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
grammar: Periods                : Identify and use periods at the end of sentences
wordWork: Concept Words                : Identify and use number words
